subject: College Athletics
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: GRAND FORKS, N.D., Dec. 16 (AP) — A trial challenging an N.C.A.A. ban on the University of North Dakota’s nickname, the Fighting Sioux, will not be held for a year, and the judge in the case is urging both sides to settle out of court.
snippet: GRAND FORKS, N.D., Dec. 16 (AP) — A trial challenging an N.C.A.A. ban on the University of North Dakota’s nickname, the Fighting Sioux, will not be held for a year, and the judge in the case is urging both sides to settle out of court.
